name: Senior Recruiter - Claims & Underwriting
description: Manages full-cycle recruitment for technical and specialized roles in claims processing and underwriting departments, including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and offer negotiation. Focuses on filling roles impacted by AI transformation initiatives.

name: Recruiter - Customer Service & Operations
description: Recruits for customer service, operations, and administrative positions across all product lines, managing high-volume hiring needs and building talent pipelines for entry and mid-level roles.

name: Talent Sourcing Specialist - Digital & Technical
description: Identifies and engages passive candidates for AI, data science, and technology roles supporting Acme's digital transformation. Uses advanced sourcing tools, Boolean search, and professional networks to build talent communities.

name: Talent Sourcing Specialist - Field Operations
description: Sources candidates for field-based roles including claims adjusters, agents, and regional operations staff. Manages relationships with staffing partners and conducts market research on talent availability.

name: Senior Learning Designer - Digital Transformation
description: Designs and develops comprehensive learning programs for AI tool adoption, process changes, and digital skill development across claims, underwriting, and customer service functions. Partners with business leaders to identify learning needs.

name: Learning Designer - Compliance & Product Knowledge
description: Creates instructor-led and e-learning courses for regulatory compliance, product knowledge, and customer service excellence. Develops assessments and maintains learning content libraries across life, health, and P&C product lines.

name: Training Coordinator - Enterprise Programs
description: Coordinates logistics and administration for large-scale training initiatives including onboarding, compliance training, and leadership development programs. Manages training schedules, materials, and participant tracking.

name: Training Coordinator - Systems & Tools
description: Supports end-user training for HRIS, claims management systems, underwriting platforms, and new AI tools. Manages training environments, creates quick-reference guides, and provides technical support during system implementations.

name: HR Generalist - Claims & Underwriting
description: Provides comprehensive HR support to claims and underwriting departments including employee relations, performance management, compensation guidance, and change management during AI implementation.

name: HR Generalist - Customer Service & Sales
description: Manages HR operations for customer service centers and sales teams, handling recruitment support, employee engagement, policy administration, and performance management across multiple locations.

name: Senior HRIS Analyst
description: Manages Acme's HRIS infrastructure, system integrations, and data governance. Leads system upgrades, troubleshoots technical issues, and ensures data accuracy across payroll, benefits, and talent management platforms.

name: HRIS Analyst - Reporting & Analytics
description: Develops HRIS reports, dashboards, and analytics to support HR decision-making and business intelligence. Manages data extracts, creates workforce metrics, and supports compliance reporting requirements.

name: Senior Compensation Analyst
description: Conducts market analysis, manages salary structures, and develops compensation strategies aligned with business objectives and competitive positioning. Supports executive compensation and equity programs.

name: Compensation Analyst - Job Evaluation & Equity
description: Evaluates job roles, maintains job descriptions, and ensures internal pay equity across Acme. Analyzes compensation data, supports pay equity audits, and recommends adjustments for new and existing positions.

name: Senior Benefits Administrator
description: Oversees benefits program administration including health insurance, retirement plans, and wellness initiatives. Manages vendor relationships, ensures compliance with regulations, and handles complex benefits inquiries.

name: Benefits Administrator - Enrollment & Support
description: Manages open enrollment processes, processes benefits changes, and provides employee support for health insurance, 401(k), and other benefit programs. Maintains benefits documentation and coordinates with carriers.
